title: kopipe
author: kopipe
content: I wish to buy these:And will pay 2x cost in BTC, ETH, or XMR.YOU MUST ACTUALLY BUY. I WILL NOT ACCEPT PIRATED FILES. I WILL DEMAND A RECEIPT BE SENT TO copypaste@kittens.ph AS PROOF.This is a low amount, I am a doxed person who's been here years, either trust me or don't, no escrow and no time wasters demanding I send first please.Give me up to 48 hrs to pay. Post here too if you buy it and send it to me so others know not to bother.For clarity these four:https://drecords.in/product/best-of-gurbani/https://drecords.in/product/300-saal-guru-de-naal/https://drecords.in/product/japji-sahib-the-church-organ/https://drecords.in/product/japji-sahib-the-inner-journey/

comments.author: kopipe
comments.body: Oh and for absolute clarity I will also not accept from Apple Music, or from Amazon, you must use their webstore. I want the best versions they have.
